name: Telegram UserBotX
description: [TG-UBotX] A modular Telegram userbot running on Python 3.6+ with an sqlalchemy database.

OWNER_ID.description: Get this value by running by doing /info.

SUDO_USERS.description: To add sudo for your bot.

SUPPORT_USERS.description: To add Support Users for your bot.

DONATION_LINK.description: Donation link if you want it.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

WORKERS.description: Define how many Cores to use.

BAN_STICKER.description: Add a sticker id, to use while banning a user.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Whether to allow using exclamation marks ! for commands as well as /
